body.ab: The subject of your communication of yesterday in reference to the absence of power in the Governor of Montana to fill vacancies in office during the recess of the Legislative Council, will be brought to the notice of the Committees on Territories of the two Houses, at the next session.
body.note: question of certain power in Governor of Montana
